original_title: Rory Fanning: From Ranger to Resister
overview: After ex-NFL star turned soldier Pat Tillman's death is covered up by the U.S. Army, Rory Fanning is discharged from the Army for resisting a second combat tour. Back home, he walks across the country while studying the history of war resistors.
tagline: A soldier's personal quest to find honor in choosing not to answer the nation's call.
title: Rory Fanning: From Ranger to Resister
